column2: BRIEF-Xylem Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.43 May 1 (Reuters) - Xylem Inc: * XYLEM REPORTS SEVEN PERCENT ORGANIC REVENUE INCREASE AND STRONG DOUBLE-DIGIT GROWTH IN 1ST QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.51 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ON AN ORGANIC BASIS, CONTINUES TO ANTICIPATE REVENUE GROWTH IN RANGE OF FOUR TO SIX PERCENT FOR FULL-YEAR 2018 * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.92, REVENUE VIEW $5.16 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $2.82 TO $2.97 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
